message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make a counteroffer, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I'm now offering the product to you for $105.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with a price of $100 for the product.
